flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 36 * (2/3) = <<36*2/3=108/2>>108/2 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 36 - 108/2 = <<36-108/2=-18>>-18 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has -18 + 10 + 3 = <<-18+10+3=-5>>-5 pairs of socks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 108/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
